TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed CustomErrorCollection extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection
Public NotInheritable Class CustomErrorCollection Inherits ConfigurationElementCollection

span.span: Represents a collection of objects.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类型允许访问`error`的元素`customErrors`部分元素集合。The type allows access to the `error` elements of the `customErrors` section element collection. 它所属的组将包括， ，和。It belongs to a group that includes the , , and . ## Examples 此示例演示如何以声明方式为指定值`error`的元素`customErrors`部分中，还可作为元素的访问集合。This example demonstrates how to specify values declaratively for the `error` elements of the `customErrors` section, which can also be accessed as elements of the collection. 下面的配置文件示例演示如何以声明方式为指定值`error`元素。The following configuration file example shows how to specify values declaratively for the `error` elements. ``` ``` 下面的代码示例演示如何使用类。The following code example demonstrates how to use the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 更新配置文件之后调用的结果方法是依赖于选择。The result of updating the configuration file after calling the method is dependent upon the chosen. 若要更新的配置文件，你使用这两个重载之一：和。To update the configuration file, you use one of these two overloads: and . > [!NOTE] > 调用等效于调用。Calling is equivalent to calling . 如果使用基方法，下列条件适用。If you use the .method, the following conditions apply. - 如果传递或参数值，则`clear`元素插入到`clientTarget`层次结构级别的当前配置文件的部分。If you pass a or parameter value, then a `clear` element is inserted into the `clientTarget` section of the configuration file at the current hierarchy level. - 如果传递参数值、 一系列`remove`元素添加到[clientTarget 元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/17a0fa6e-a065-49cc-b900-ef73eda6a922)当前层次结构级别上的配置文件。If you pass the parameter value, a series of `remove` elements are added to the [clientTarget Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/17a0fa6e-a065-49cc-b900-ef73eda6a922) of the configuration file at the current hierarchy level. 每个删除对所有引用`add`层次结构中较高级别上的父配置文件中定义的元素。Each removes all references to an `add` element defined in a parent configuration file at a higher level in the hierarchy. 当你使用，会影响什么获取序列化到配置文件的集合上还有另一个附加属性： ，即`false`默认情况下。When you use , there is one additional property on the collection that affects what gets serialized to the configuration file: , which is `false` by default. 以下条件适用。The following conditions apply. - 如果设置为`true`，`clear`元素插入到`clientTarget`层次结构级别的当前配置文件的部分。If the set to `true`, `clear` element is inserted into the `clientTarget` section of the configuration file at the current hierarchy level. 这将删除对所有引用`add`层次结构中的更高级别的父配置文件中定义的元素。This removes all references to the `add` elements defined in the parent configuration files at higher levels in the hierarchy. - 如果标志设置为`false`，则`clear`元素已从`clientTarget`当前层次结构级别，如果它存在，则在配置文件的部分。If the flag is set to `false`, the `clear` element is removed from the `clientTarget` section of the configuration file at the current hierarchy level, if it exists. 方法实际上会删除`add`中定义的元素`clientTarget`层次结构级别的当前配置文件的部分。The method actually deletes the `add` elements defined in the `clientTarget` section of the configuration file at the current hierarchy level. 它还会删除对层次结构中的更高级别的父配置文件中定义的 add 元素的所有引用。It also removes all references to the add elements defined in the parent configuration files at higher levels in the hierarchy. > [!NOTE] > `add`元素不会从删除`clientTarget`父配置文件的部分。The `add` elements are not deleted from the `clientTarget` section of the parent configuration files. ## Examples 下面的代码示例中移除所有中的对象集合。The following code example removes all the objects from the collection. 请参阅中的代码示例类主题，了解如何获取的集合。Refer to the code example in the class topic to learn how to get the collection. summary.span: 从集合中移除 对象。

span.span: Removes a object from the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法插入`remove`元素插入`customErrors`层次结构级别的当前配置文件的部分。The method inserts a `remove` element into the `customErrors` section of the configuration file at the current hierarchy level. 这将删除对引用`add`层次结构中的更高级别的父配置文件中定义的元素。This removes the reference to the `add` element defined in the parent configuration files at higher levels in the hierarchy. > [!NOTE] > `add`元素不会从父配置文件中删除。The `add` elements are not deleted from the parent configuration files. `remove`元素只是将其停用。The `remove` element merely deactivates them. 但是，方法会在当前的层次结构级别时实际删除。However, the method does actually delete them at the current hierarchy level. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何删除对象与指定的状态代码。The following code example shows how to remove the object with the specified status code. 请参阅中的代码示例类主题，了解如何获取的集合。Refer to the code example in the class topic to learn how to get the collection. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsSection#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsSection/CS/customerrorssection.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsSection#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsSection/VB/customerrorssection.vb#7)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法插入`remove`元素插入`customErrors`层次结构级别的当前配置文件的部分。The method inserts a `remove` element into the `customErrors` section of the configuration file at the current hierarchy level. 这将删除对引用`add`元素在父配置文件中定义更高级别的层次结构中。This is to remove the reference to the `add` element defined in the parent configuration files at higher-level in the hierarchy. **请注意**`add`元素不会从父配置文件中删除。**Note** The `add` elements are not deleted from the parent configuration files. 只是停用。They are merely deactivated. 但是，方法会在当前的层次结构级别时实际删除。However, the method does actually delete them at the current hierarchy level. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何删除中指定索引处的对象。The following code example shows how to remove the object at the specified index. 请参阅中的代码示例类主题，了解如何获取的集合。Refer to the code example in the class topic to learn how to get the collection. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsSection#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsSection/CS/customerrorssection.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsSection#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsSection/VB/customerrorssection.vb#8)]
